about_the_game:
Take control of a captain whose adventures have taken him everywhere, except Kjoch, a city where he yearns to dock his ship. Witness the captain as he ventures into unknown lands to reach his destination, only to find himself near an unknown village and lose his ship and crewmates after a wild storm separates him from everything he has.

Everything Except:

His Trusty Old Sword!

Fight the Unwanted In Your Way


In order to even look for a clue of your crewmates, the captain must use his sword where needed as the land where he ended up is mostly hostile. Use the captain's sword to navigate this strange land of fields, villages, and caves where pirates terrorize the locals. Help yourself and the locals by fighting your way through waves of pirates controlling the area to find clues of your crew's whereabouts. As your adventures commence, the captain will face other exotic creatures he has never seen. Will the captain even find his crew? Find out now by taking control of him in this combat-based action-adventure game.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-540 or AMD 3 1200
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11

Recommended:

short_description: Play as a captain who ventures into new lands with his crewmates until a storm passing by mysteriously parts him away from his ship and crew. Help the captain find his missing crew and overcome the challenges on the path by fighting unwanted guests using his trusty old sword.
